comment.author: 7313591@N02
comment._content:
You had promised to geotag your photographs... 

It would make them (even) more interesting. Lots of people in the world, even among the passionate friends of Norway, do not know where Laurvig is.

comment.author: 48220291@N04
comment._content: The reason it takes a little while for our images to get geotagged, is that it is done in two operations (by two different people). We promise to have them geotagged shortly.
